attributes.action: Instead of 18 give ID of 16..? It would help everyone a lot!!
attributes.additional_details: As they have a voice and people hear and respect them whereas us youngsters don't and no one cares about us where just a waste of time to everyone..😔
attributes.background: It would help everyone if the I'd was 16 instead of 18 so you could get in places and do other fun stuff.🤪

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly which age restrictions you would like to change.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
